select i.* ,iLike.iGood ,m.name ,m.nickName ,m.img ,m.auth ,m.id ,CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, i.iDate, NOW()) < 60 THEN '방금 전' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.iDate, NOW()) < 60 THEN concat(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, i.iDate, NOW()), '분 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, i.iDate, NOW()) < 24 THEN concat(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, i.iDate, NOW()), '시간 전') WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, i.iDate, NOW()) < 5 THEN concat(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, i.iDate, NOW()), '일 전') ELSE date_format(i.iDate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regDate from tblInterview i inner join tblMember m on i.mSeq = m.mSeq left outer join (select iSeq, count(*) as iGood from tblIntgood group by iSeq) as iLike on i.iSeq = iLike.iSeq where i.iSeq = #{iSeq}
